data.eml:eml: Two new species of Pleciobates (Hemiptera: Gerromorpha: Gerridae) from India, with a key to the species of Pleciobates

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jehamalar, E. Eyarin, Chandra, Kailash, Zettel, Herbert, Basu, Srimoyee, Barman, Bijita, Gupta, Susmita, Subramanian, K. A. (2014): Two new species of Pleciobates (Hemiptera: Gerromorpha: Gerridae) from India, with a key to the species of Pleciobates. Zootaxa 3866 (3): 435-445, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3866.3.7
